summary: My first mod adding my character Ora as a follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4][color=#ffff00]﻿She can be found in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.[/color]

[/size][/center][center]
[size=3]My first Skyrim follower using my character Ora
Just a small warning she might not look that great in game.
[/size]


[b]Required[/b]


[size=4][b]Skyrim
Update
Dawnguard
RaceCompatibility[/b][/size]
